amendment.description: To require a report on the costs of the Comprehensive Service Programs for homeless veterans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5138 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5138 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Obama. (consideration: CR S10903) To require a report on the costs of the Comprehensive Service Programs for homeless veterans.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5138 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Obama.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5138 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
